channel.title: Royal-Scape Development Team
channel.description:
[center][b]Royal Scape Development Team[/b][/center] [center][i]If you are interested in Working with Former, RoyalLofts and Habbz Hotel Staff to create a Runescape private server, This job is for you. Fill out application below to be looked at for the Royal-Scape Server Team. Thanks and take care.[/i][/center] [i][b] Application:[/b][/i]
* Real Name: First * Location: City / Country / TimeZone * Position: Source / Client / Graphics (YOU MAY CHOOSE 2 NO MORE) * Age: ANSWER HERE * SOURCE ONLY- Java Experience (Years, RSPS does count): ANSWER HERE * CLIENT ONLY- Client Experience: ANSWER HERE * GRAPHICS ONLY- Graphics Experience & Programs: ANSWER HERE * Anything you want to add: ANSWER HERE
Love, Emily P.S Guys I know i have not provided a lot of info that is my fault, I apologize. What I am wanting to accomplish is to make a a kind of "real" Runescape. All quest, raising the levels like the normal Runescape, just everyhting will be cheaper and no buying of membership. I will not just "layback" I am a girl and handle things with much organization. I have a lot of ideas and really am trying to get a team together to maybe make this "dream" come true. So if your interested it will Be a 508 if anything if your interested. PM me for any questions or wanting to join and help out on this project.

item.title: Royal-Scape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

"Habbz Hotel Staff

Habbo hotel, that’s what i’m thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal-Scape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

much organization
wat

If I were to work for you, would I receive compensation in some form? Your application doesn’t look very well though out, and apparently you didn’t proof-read the thread before you posted. When you say “Habbz Hotel Staff”, or whatever, do you mean staff members from the actual game? Or is that the name of a person?

I don’t like the fact that you worked your gender into this for obvious reasons.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal-Scape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I will not just "layback" I am a girl and handle things with much organization
I like how you mentioned your gender in there, although it doesn't mean much to people here.

Don’t try another RS remake, it’s been done before so try something different. People are sick of hearing RS remakes, ask anyone.

Read full topic

Guys I know i have not provided a lot of info that is my fault, I apologize.

What I am wanting to accomplish is to make a a kind of “real” Runescape. All quest, raising the levels like the normal Runescape, just everyhting will be cheaper and no buying of membership. I will not just “layback” I am a girl and handle things with much organization. I have a lot of ideas and really am trying to get a team together to maybe make this “dream” come true.

So if your interested it will Be a 508 if anything if your interested.

Thanks Love,
Emily

PM me for any questions or wanting to join and help out on this project.

Read full topic

item.title: Royal-Scape Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Theblaqcat Theblaqcat
item.description:
@Theblaqcat wrote:

[center]Royal Scape Development Team[/center]

[center]If you are interested in Working with Former, RoyalLofts and Habbz Hotel Staff to create a Runescape private server, This job is for you. Fill out application below to be looked at for the Royal-Scape Server Team. Thanks and take care.[/center]


Application:

* Real Name: First
* Location: City / Country / TimeZone
* Position: Source / Client / Graphics (YOU MAY CHOOSE 2 NO MORE)
* Age: ANSWER HERE
* SOURCE ONLY- Java Experience (Years, RSPS does count): ANSWER HERE
* CLIENT ONLY- Client Experience: ANSWER HERE
* GRAPHICS ONLY- Graphics Experience & Programs: ANSWER HERE
* Anything you want to add: ANSWER HERE

Love,
Emily

P.S
Guys I know i have not provided a lot of info that is my fault, I apologize.

What I am wanting to accomplish is to make a a kind of “real” Runescape. All quest, raising the levels like the normal Runescape, just everyhting will be cheaper and no buying of membership. I will not just “layback” I am a girl and handle things with much organization. I have a lot of ideas and really am trying to get a team together to maybe make this “dream” come true.

So if your interested it will Be a 508 if anything if your interested.

PM me for any questions or wanting to join and help out on this project.

Read full topic
